name: Ch.12ABaseConvo1
_source: speak;Larachel;Ah! Just the commoners I was seeking!|Greetings, humble subjects of the land!
speak;Larachel;I, the beautiful princess of peerless beauty...|Have decided to expand my understanding of the common folk!
speak;Larachel;Tell me, do you not find the price of turnips absolutely outrageous this season?
speak;Colm;Turnips?|I don't really keep track of...
speak;Larachel;Of course, of course!|You're a thief! You simply steal your turnips!|How resourceful you commoners are!
speak;Colm;I don't steal turnips!|And I'm not a-|I mean, thieving is besides the-|Why on earth is that the first thing you-
speak;Larachel;And you, young lumberjack!|I'm sure you're concerned about the proper felling techniques for the winter oaks?
speak;Ross;Winter oaks? Wha?|I've just been chopping firewood for us...
speak;Larachel;Precisely!|It's so refreshing to discuss the struggles of manual labor!|I find I'm quite adept at speaking your language!
speak;Colm;What exactly are you trying to-
speak;Larachel;But of course!|I believe this is what you folk call a 'pocket money collector?'
speak;Larachel;Ah!|How versatile your tools are!|Both for fish AND currency!|Your resourcefulness knows no bounds!
speak;Colm;Hey, Princess, look.|We appreciate... uh...|Whatever this is?|But I was just trying to-
speak;Larachel;Say no more, my good man!|I understand that commoners are always pressed for time!|Working sunrise to sunset with your... common... things.
speak;Larachel;Which is why I've brought you these!
speak;Ross;Whoa... these are made of marble, aren't they?
speak;Larachel;Indeed!|For praying to the Goddess!|Or, whatever gods you pray to!|However you common folk utilize such things!
speak;Ross;These are worth more than everything I own...
speak;Larachel;Think nothing of it!|I've found our conversation most illuminating!|I truly understand the plight of the common man now!
speak;Larachel;Well, I must be off!|Divine duties call!|Farewell, my humble allies!
speak;Ross;Did she just give us expensive statues?
speak;Ross;I dunno. She's a princess...|And, I mean, she seemed so happy about it.
speak;Colm;She did, yeah... but that was so...|Ugh, fine, whatever.|At least we got something valuable out of it.
